column5: Come stay at our 1920's cottage in central San Antonio! We offer a clean and quiet space that is close to the best of San Antonio.   Centrally located near  - The Pearl (~5 miles) - Riverwalk (~4 miles)  - The Alamo Downtown (~ 6 miles) - Alamodome (~ 6 miles) - Southtown (~5 miles) - UTHSC Medical Center (~7 miles) - AT&T Center (~8 miles) - Fort Sam Houston (~7.5 miles) - San Pedro Spring (~2 miles) - Woodlawn lake, great brunches, coffee shops, and so much more!
column8: Historic 1927 Cozy Cottage ~5 miles to downtown
